wiki.content:
"Bullet with Butterfly Wings" is a song by American alternative rock band The Smashing Pumpkins. It was the lead single from the band's 1995 double album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness. The song won the 1997 Grammy Award for Best Hard Rock Performance. It was the band's first Top 40 US hit, peaking at number 22 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was also named the 91st best hard rock song of all time by VH1.
  
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Bullet with Butterfly Wings" is a song by American alternative rock band The Smashing Pumpkins. It was the lead single from the band's 1995 double album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness. The song won the 1997 Grammy Award for Best Hard Rock Performance. It was the band's first Top 40 US hit, peaking at number 22 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was also named the 91st best hard rock song of all time by VH1.

track.name: Bullet With Butterfly Wings
comments: This song never gets old! need to listen to this so loud your ears bleed [3] and of course: Despite all my rage I am still just Nicolas Cage [5]
Somehow I do not think this belongs on Cure Radio..
need to listen to this so loud your ears bleed (2) :D
First Pumpkins Song I found(Dead Space 2lol). Not my favorite but it's the one I've heard the most, it's probably the catchiest I've heard from them and I'll probably never get tired of it.
And I still believe that I cannot be saved.
Despite all my rage I am still just Nicolas Cage [4]
this was on the radio around the time I first discovered masturbation....memories of 95
despite all my rage i am still just nicholas cage [3]
Whale Wars! Ok... I can't even say it without laughing.
